snippet.title: Metroid 2 Remake AKA AM2R Full Version Gameplay
snippet.description:
A great fan-made remake of Metroid 2: Return of Samus by metroid2remake.blogspot.com/ has been released!

Here are 13 min of the gameplay. 

FINAL UPDATE: 2/Sep/2016

This time DoctorM64 has received a DMCA takedown request on his personal e-mail account.
States any further development of AM2R has ceased permanently & thanks all of us for the support. 

EXTRA UPDATE: 24/Sep/2016

There is a remastered OST & instructions on how to enable them for the in-game usage!

https://www.reddit.com/r/AM2R/comments/549g6u/remastered_ost_tracks_for_ingame_use/

http://metroid2remake.blogspot.si/2016/09/soundtrack.html


Link to the game: 
https://mega.nz/#!4QthSACb!OWv4lCq80IhlYZGUhuN8vA1qlvKQMkcCVIpeN-Gv1QQ
 ----

AM2R = Another Metroid 2 Remake
